characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Consistently demonstrates a direct and clear communication style, making it easy for others to understand their thoughts and opinions.

options.description: Directly states their thoughts without hesitation.
Takes time to consider their words carefully before expressing themselves.

characteristics.name: Interest in Idle Games
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a strong interest and enthusiasm for idle games, as seen in their content related to game development.

options.description: Shows intense excitement and dedication when discussing idle games.
Expresses a general interest but does not seem overly invested.

characteristics.name: Personality Traits
characteristics.description: Consistently showcases a friendly and approachable demeanor in their content, making it easy for others to connect with.

options.description: Demonstrates genuine warmth and empathy towards others.
Tends to use humor that may not be immediately apparent.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Shows an understanding of how social dynamics work, as seen in their content about community engagement and collaboration.

options.description: Demonstrates a strong ability to understand and respect different perspectives.
Tends to prefer individual pursuits over group activities.

characteristics.name: Value Alignment
characteristics.description: Consistently aligns their actions with a strong sense of personal values, as seen in their content related to social responsibility.

options.description: Prioritizes the greater good above personal interests.
Places personal gain above all else.

characteristics.name: Game Development Experience
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a high level of experience and expertise in game development, as seen in their content about game mechanics and design.

options.description: Possesses extensive knowledge and skills in game development.
Lacks significant experience or understanding of game development principles.

characteristics.name: Humor Style
characteristics.description: Consistently uses humor that is lighthearted and playful, making it enjoyable for others to engage with.

options.description: Uses clever wordplay and sarcasm to deliver humor.
Tends to rely on slapstick humor or silly impressions.

characteristics.name: Community Engagement
characteristics.description: Demonstrates a strong commitment to engaging with and contributing to online communities, as seen in their content about community building.

options.description: Regularly participates in discussions and responds to comments.
Prefers to observe from the sidelines rather than actively engage.
